text: @NYGovCuomo You’re in denial you haven’t reached out to not one family that lost a love one in a nursing facility this is my aunt that you murdered because you allowed COVID-19 patients to be brought back in do you want to blame everyone else except for yourself you have blood on your hands https://t.co/1QMqT7vUBy
